prompt:
Patient: No. I'm not.

Nurse: Give me a moment to check how I can best support you.

Nurse: Alright, Mr. Valenzuela. If you have any questions later, feel free to ask. Now, I'd like to move onto the instructions for the clear liquid diet and PLENVU laxative solution. This is often the hardest part of the prep. How are you feeling about it?

Patient: Again ready to get this over with.

Nurse: I understand, Mr. Valenzuela. It's a common sentiment that the procedure itself is no problem at all, but the bowel prep can be a bit tough. We're here to support you every step of the way. Do you have any questions or concerns about this part of the preparation?

Patient: I don't have any questions.

Nurse: Give me a moment while I figure out how I can best help you. Alright, Mr. Valenzuela. If you have any questions later, feel free to ask. Now, you don't have to do anything just yet. But you'll need to start your bowel prep 24 hours before your procedure by drinking only clear liquids which involves no solid foods and drinking either clear or light colored beverages without any red or purple dye. Can I share some examples of what clear liquids are and you can tell me what questions you have about the diet?

Patient: I have no questions about the diet. I completely under

responses.gpt4: Great, Mr. Valenzuela. I'm glad to hear that. Do you have a favorite clear liquid you'll be consuming more of during this time?
responses.our_model: I'm sorry, Mr. Valenzuela, your message got cut off. Could you please confirm if you understand the clear liquid diet instructions?
